post.body: Good foryou. You may find this of interest. http://tinyurl.com/puppiesbite
The minute I came out they all went to sleep. Typical!
Good times ahead. Puppies rule.
Very cute puppy. What about Angel for a name?
Never a good way to wake up.
I have three mixed breeds. ie mongrels. They are the best!
It's definitely been an odd day. Its now 7hrs later and they are still hyped up. Weird.
A tired dog is a happy owner. Mine will not BE tired today though. Had 2hr hike as well.
It's when the dogs start filing a spoon to make a shank that you need to worry.
http://tinyurl.com/stoppuppybites This will really help.
You will love it. You may want to read this though. http://tinyurl.com/stoppuppybites the little pups can really hurt.
I am sure it will be fine. Have you got an elizabethan collar though. Must protect the stitches.
Mutts are the best. Live longer and are healthier for the most.
Unfortunately the snow didn't last. Maybe soon though. I love getting snowed in up the mountain for a few days.
Fraid not. No three Dog Bakery here in Spain. As far as I know.
Sorry about the delay. It seems they are constantly hyper at the moment. Maybe it's the cold?
My dogs are impervious to the cold. Only time they shake is in a nice warm shower but a freezing lake is great!
You have that nice big red hat to keep your ears warm as well!
What a cutie of a puppy. Love the different eye colours.
Oh, no, that is v bad but still made me laugh.
Near Tortosa which is by the river Ebro, we live up in the mountains.
That's a great thing to be doing. Congrats.
Mongol is supposed to be good. Indiana, ok for a bit of fun but not memorable.
I'm in Spain and it's raining here too.Shouldn't be allowed.
http://tinyurl.com/8u3v2m may help with puppy problems.
Showered all 3 dogs of mine today. No one was happy . Sat shivering in a boiling shower!!!
Six dogs! You have double my score!
Bad dog! I guess someone is excited about christmas.
This may help stop puppy biting/chewing http://tinyurl.com/pupbites
Congrats.
If I could I would!!!
Get yourself a little afternoon "siesta". It's compulsory here!
I find it odd having to buy free range eggs with a stamp on. Not how they come out of a chicken. Wish they'd start laying!
This is our second batch, after an "incident" but they are very friendly and easy to look after. Highkly recommended.
people are bonkers. Q. Where can i buy cooked duck A. -cookedducksrus. And she gets mad at me, I mean that's insane.Life, weird.
can't even have a shower without a dog whining!
I don't know what the dogs have been doing but they stink!
http://tinyurl.com/5hk99j How much exercise dogs need. A lot today.
My Latest dog blog post. http://tinyurl.com/5hk99j How much exercise does a dog need?
http://tinyurl.com/5hk99j new dog blog post. my dogs will not tire out today.
Dogs are crazed today. 2 hr hike and still running about 7 hrs later. Bonkers dogsters.
ReTweet of my latest dog blog post http://tinyurl.com/5hk99j how much exercise do dogs need.
New Dog blog post Dangerous Food For Dogs. Things I never Knew.: I have been getting a lot of w.. http://tinyurl.com/62jcg8
Time to put coffee on.V cold. All I seem to tweet about is the cold and the dogs.
Wishing I was still in bed,don't want to take dogs out. It's too cold this early!
Took dogs for a walk and it started to snow, here in Spain. Hooray!
Building up to a nice long walk with the dogs
Dogs are outside being bonkers. Again! They are energy monsters at the moment. No stopping them.
Wishing the dogs weren't so hyper. Again!!!
So, anyone bought the dog poo calendar I blogged about earlier? Someone must have got one
Listening to the dogs barking at the wild mountain goats but not chasing them away from the veg plot.
http://tinyurl.com/dogstory Make a contribution to the dog story and get a free link for your site or just have fun. It needs YOU!
http://tinyurl.com/betterbehavedog my best dog blog post to date. More comments welcome there. Dofollow.
New Dog blog post Cats Are Better Than Dogs And Dogs Are Rubbish. Who Said That?: It is a glori.. http://tinyurl.com/8d55lc
Super warm day in Spain. All dogs happy outside soaking it up.
New Dog blog post No Dead Dogs Today: Well, my heart rate can finally return to normal. After a.. http://tinyurl.com/8b6ak9
New Dog blog post Iâ€™m Going To Smack My Dogs: As I sit here typing this I am probably the madde.. http://tinyurl.com/6w5mkb
Later dudes.Off to watch buzzcocks on naughty spanish satellite connection. keep it fun.
My first annoying encounter on twitter. What is wrong with some people. I guess this is bound to happen. Unfollow and be happy.
carondg you are removed for being ungracious in the face of humour. I was trying to be friends and have fun, life is too short for rudeness
